p: P. uviferum is a conifer native to Chile and Argentina that is known to be highly resistant to attack by microorganisms and insects. It has been postulated that its resistance is related to its chemical composition ( Solis et al., 2004; Donoso et al., 2008). Therefore, this tree may be a potential source of natural products that can act as inhibitors of the S. aureus NorA efflux pump.
